evidence.text: DEFENDANTS’ MOTION TO DISMISS ... WHEREFORE, PREMISES CONSIDERED, Defendants respectfully request that this Court grant their Motion to Dismiss and enter an order dismissing the all claims against them. DATE: MARCH 30, 2021

extracted.value: Defendants filed a Motion to Dismiss on March 30, 2021, requesting the Court to dismiss Plaintiffs’ Fifth Amended Complaint and all claims against them.

evidence.source_document: Defendants' Motion to Sever Claims into Separate Civil Actions or Alternatively for Separate Trials
evidence.text: Defendants respectfully request that the Court sever each of the 14 Plaintiffs’ claims into 14 separate civil actions. Alternatively, if the Court does not order that the claims be severed into 14 completely separate actions, Defendants request that the Court order that there be separate trials for each of the 14 Plaintiffs. Dated: October 23, 2024.

extracted.value: Defendants filed a Motion to Sever Claims into Separate Civil Actions or alternatively for Separate Trials on October 23, 2024, requesting that each of the 14 Plaintiffs’ claims be severed into separate civil actions or separate trials under Rule 21 or Rule 42.
